imagingbook.pub.regions

Class RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.regions.RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion>, Iterable<Point>
    Enclosing class:
    RegionLabeling

    public class RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion
extends Object
implements Comparable<RegionLabeling.BinaryRegion>, Iterable<Point>
    This class of RegionLabeling represents a connected component or binary region. It is implemented as an inner class to RegionLabeling because it references common region labeling data. Instances of this class support iteration over the contained pixel coordinates of type Point, e.g., by 
     import java.awt.Point;
 
 BinaryRegion R = ...;
 for (Point p : R) {
    // process point p ...
 }

      • addPixel

        protected void addPixel(int u,
                        int v)
        Use this method to add a single pixel to this region. Updates summation and boundary variables used to calculate various region statistics.
        Parameters:
        u - x-position
        v - y-position

      • update

        protected void update()
        Call this method to update the region's statistics. For now only the center coordinates (xc, yc) are updated. Add additional statements as needed to update your own region statistics.

      • getOuterContour

        public Contour getOuterContour()
        Get the (single) outer contour of this region. Points on an outer contour are arranged in clockwise order.
        Returns:
        the outer contour.

      • setOuterContour

        protected void setOuterContour(Contour contr)

      • getInnerContours

        public List<Contour> getInnerContours()
        Get all inner contours of this region. Points on inner contours are arranged in counter-clockwise order.
        Returns:
        the list of inner contours.

        public double getProperty(String name)
        Retrieves the specified region property. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the property is not defined for this region.

        The value associated with the specified property.
